snippet: Though much of the designers’ offerings were special-occasion clothes, their audience spoke loudly that the shirt, in all its manifestations, should triumph.
abstract: Bill Cunningham observes that many collections at New York Fashion Week featured the shirtdress.
lead_paragraph: Though much of the designers’ offerings were special-occasion clothes, their audience spoke loudly that the shirt, in all its manifestations, should triumph.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | New York Fashion Week
